Name: HORDE ATTACK
About the game: Horde attack is a demolition derby in middle ages! Send swarms of riders from city to city to conquer the huge world in this fast-paced multiplayer strategy game! Horde Attack includes: Clans battling for world dominance Tournament to prove your amazing skills Variety of changing environments Stimulating gameplay Hours of replay using different strategies Vibrant warfare. Robbery of merchants Game for up to 4 people on one screen and multiplayer Sharp enemy AI Low-poly graphics pleasant sounds and smooth controls makes 'Horde Attack' a distinct piece of art that is a pure pleasure to play. Increase your tribe with 30 riders to a giant Horde of ignorant pity and fear.
